game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient temple's artifact and bring it back to the village.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple has been discovered in the nearby jungle, said to contain an ancient relic. The villagers are eager to possess this relic, which is rumored to grant immense power.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the temple.
task.description: The entrance to the temple is well-hidden. You'll need to search the jungle carefully to find it.

task.objective: Navigate through the temple's maze-like tunnels.
task.description: The tunnels within the temple are treacherous. You'll need to be cautious not to get lost or trapped.

task.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the temple's inner sanctum.
task.description: The artifact is heavily guarded. You'll need to defeat the guardians and overcome any obstacles in your path.
